titles.en: Chapter 26 – The Quran Guides to the Imams<sup>asws</sup>

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ النِّعْمَةَ الَّتِي ذَكَرَهَا اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ فِي كِتَابِهِ الْأَئِمَّةُ ( عليهم السلام )
titles.en: Chapter 27 – The Favour (النِّعْمَةَ) which Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic Mentioned in His<sup>azwj</sup> Book, are the Imams<sup>asws</sup>

titles.ar: بَابُ أَنَّ الْأَئِمَّةَ فِي كِتَابِ اللَّهِ إِمَامَانِ إِمَامٌ يَدْعُو إِلَى اللَّهِ وَ إِمَامٌ يَدْعُو إِلَى النَّارِ
titles.en: Chapter 25 – The Imams in the Book of Allah<sup>asws</sup> are two (types of) Imams – an Imam<sup>asws</sup> calling to Allah<sup>azwj</sup> and an imam calling to the Fire
Chapter 26 – The Quran Guides to the Imams<sup>asws</sup>

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (444/ 2)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا الْحَسَنِ الرِّضَا ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ قَوْلِهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ وَ لِكُلٍّ جَعَلْنا مَوالِيَ مِمَّا تَرَكَ الْوالِدانِ وَ الْأَقْرَبُونَ وَ الَّذِينَ عَقَدَتْ أَيْمانُكُمْ قَالَ إِنَّمَا عَنَى بِذَلِكَ الْأَئِمَّةَ ( عليهم السلام ) بِهِمْ عَقَدَ اللَّهُ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ أَيْمَانَكُمْ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Al Hassan Bin Mahboub who said,

‘I asked Abu Al-Hassan Al-Rezaasws about the Words of the Mighty and Majestic [4:33] And to every one We have appointed heirs of what parents and near relatives leave, and as to those with whom your right hands have ratified agreements Heasws said: ‘But rather, it Means by that, the Imamsasws. By them has Allahazwj Mighty and Majestic Ratified your agreements’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn ’Isa from al-Hasan ibn Mahbub who has said that he asked abu al-Hassan al-Rida (a.s.) about the meaning of the words of Allah, the Most Holy, the Most High. “We have chosen heirs for every legacy that parents and relatives may leave. Let those who have been promised a bequest receive their share of the legacy. . .” [4:33] It is a refrence to the Imams (a.s.) With the Imams (a.s.) Allah, the Most Holy, the Most High, has established your covenants.” 1. There have been a variety of interpretations of who are the last group of heirs mentioned in this verse, i.e., those with whom you have sworn compact, and, as a result of this, and so as to reconcile these various interpretations with the law, it has at different times been asserted that this verse was abrogated or that it was not. For example, see at.-Taban, at-Taf~ir, vol.5,

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (2/446)

parts.text: أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى إِنَّ هذَا الْقُرْآنَ يَهْدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقْوَمُ

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ إِبْرَاهِيمَ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْحَمِيدِ عَنْ مُوسَى بْنِ أُكَيْلٍ النُّمَيْرِيِّ عَنِ الْعَلَاءِ بْنِ سَيَابَةَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى إِنَّ هذَا الْقُرْآنَ يَهْدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقْوَمُ قَالَ

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Ibrahim Bin Abdul Hameed, from Musa Bin Al Akeyl Al Numeyri, from Al A’ala Bin Sayaba,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws regarding the Words of the Exalted [17:9] Surely this Quran Guides to that which is most upright. Heasws said: ‘Guides to the Imamasws’.
en.sarwar: 2. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Ibrahim ibn ‘Abd al-Hamid from Musa ibn ’Ukayl al-Numayri from al-‘Ala’ ibn Sayyaba from abu ‘Abdallah (a.s.) who has said the following about the words of Allah. “This Quran shows the way to that which is the most upright . .” [17:9] The Imams (a.s.)said, “It guides to the Imam (a.s.).”
